support.title: Support
support.description: We're here to help you get the most out of Imagine Labs. If you have any questions, concerns, or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
support.futureNote: More support options and resources will be available in future updates.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: For technical support, account issues, or general questions, please email us:

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.description: We typically respond to support requests within 24-48 hours during business days. For urgent issues, please include "URGENT" in your email subject line.

tips.title: When Contacting Support
tips.description: To help us assist you quickly, please include:

storyThemes.description: Stories about kindness, friendship, and caring for the people around us.

themes.description: Stories about forming bonds, being loyal to friends, sharing and playing together, resolving conflicts peacefully, and discovering that true friends accept us for who we are
Tales of helping others without expecting rewards, showing compassion to those in need, using gentle words, including everyone in activities, and spreading joy through small acts of caring
Adventures teaching the importance of treating others with dignity, listening to different viewpoints, honoring elders and authority figures, taking care of property, and valuing diversity
Heartwarming stories about letting go of anger, giving second chances, understanding that everyone makes mistakes, apologizing sincerely, and rebuilding trust after conflicts
Inspiring tales of sharing toys and treats, donating to those less fortunate, giving time to help others, discovering that giving brings more joy than receiving, and being generous with compliments
Warm stories celebrating family bonds, unconditional acceptance, expressing affection through actions and words, loving pets and nature, and understanding that love multiplies when shared

storyThemes.description: Stories about facing fears, staying strong, and doing the right thing even when it's hard.

themes.description: Exciting adventures about facing fears, standing up for what's right even when scared, trying new things, protecting others from harm, and discovering inner strength in challenging moments
Bold tales of speaking truth when it's difficult, defending friends from bullies, admitting mistakes, asking for help when needed, and finding bravery in everyday situations
Motivating stories about never giving up, practicing until mastery is achieved, overcoming obstacles with determination, learning from failures, and celebrating hard-earned victories
Important lessons about keeping promises, completing chores and homework, taking care of pets, owning up to mistakes, being dependable, and understanding how our actions affect others
Gentle stories teaching the value of waiting turns, staying calm in frustrating situations, understanding that good things take time, helping younger children, and finding peace in quiet moments

storyThemes.description: Stories about honesty, fairness, and working together as a team.

themes.description: Meaningful stories about telling the truth even when it's hard, being trustworthy with secrets, admitting when wrong, keeping promises, and understanding that honesty builds strong relationships
Important tales about sharing equally, taking turns, following rules in games, standing up against injustice, treating everyone equally, and ensuring everyone gets a chance to participate
Collaborative adventures showing how working together achieves more, valuing each person's strengths, communicating effectively, compromising for the group's benefit, and celebrating team victories
Uplifting stories about staying positive during tough times, believing in better days ahead, finding silver linings, encouraging others, and understanding that challenges are temporary

storyThemes.description: Stories that spark curiosity, imagination, and new ways of seeing the world.

themes.description: Exploratory tales encouraging questions about the world, investigating how things work, discovering new interests, learning through experimentation, and celebrating the joy of lifelong learning
Imaginative stories about expressing ideas through art and play, thinking outside the box, solving problems creatively, inventing new games, and believing that there's no wrong way to create
Personal journeys of understanding one's unique talents, embracing individuality, learning from experiences, building confidence, growing from challenges, and becoming the best version of oneself
Heartwarming stories about appreciating family and friends, being thankful for small joys, recognizing helpers in our lives, saying thank you, and finding happiness in what we have
Uplifting stories about staying positive during tough times, believing in better days ahead, finding silver linings, encouraging others, and understanding that challenges are temporary

storyType.description: Epic quests with brave heroes exploring new lands, overcoming obstacles, discovering treasures, meeting interesting characters, and returning home with wisdom and exciting tales to share
Action-packed tales of good versus evil, superheroes with special powers protecting the innocent, clever heroes outsmarting villains, redemption stories, and the triumph of justice and kindness
Futuristic adventures with space travel, friendly robots, amazing inventions, alien encounters, time machines, exploring other planets, and imagining how technology might change our world
Intriguing puzzles and detective stories where young sleuths follow clues, solve riddles, uncover secrets, find missing items, catch harmless tricksters, and use logic to crack the case

Fun learning adventures exploring science concepts, historical events, different cultures, nature facts, mathematical thinking, language play, and discovering how the world works through engaging narratives

Hilarious tales filled with silly situations, funny misunderstandings, playful pranks, talking animals with comedic personalities, laugh-out-loud moments, and joy-filled adventures that tickle the funny bone
Magical worlds with wizards, dragons, enchanted forests, fairy godmothers, mystical creatures, spell-casting adventures, kingdoms in the clouds, and where imagination knows no bounds

Heartwarming stories celebrating best friends, making new friends, friends helping each other through challenges, learning to understand differences, sharing adventures, and the special bond of true friendship

3Mildly spooky tales with friendly ghosts, silly monsters, haunted houses with surprises, mysterious sounds that turn out funny, costume mix-ups, and Halloween adventures that are more fun than frightening

places.placeDescription: A mysterious alien spacecraft with glowing panels, strange symbols, and advanced technology beyond human comprehension, floating silently through the cosmos
A bustling extraterrestrial colony with hexagonal chambers, bioluminescent walls, and countless alien beings working in perfect harmony
An orbiting academy with zero-gravity classrooms, holographic teachers, and windows showcasing breathtaking views of distant galaxies where future space heroes train
A hidden lunar facility with domed structures, underground tunnels, and advanced research labs, permanently shrouded in darkness on the moon's far side
An exotic exoplanet with purple skies, twin suns, and fascinating creatures that resemble Earth animals but with unique alien adaptations
A massive orbital research facility with rotating modules, solar panels stretching like wings, and astronauts conducting groundbreaking experiments in microgravity
A volcanic tropical paradise with steaming lava flows, lush jungle vegetation, and towering dinosaurs roaming among palm trees and black sand beaches
A shadowy cave littered with ancient bones, sharp rock formations, and nests where fearsome flying reptiles raise their young amid prehistoric danger
A pristine prehistoric coastline with crystal blue waters, perfect waves, and friendly cavemen riding wooden boards alongside playful marine dinosaurs
A lively jungle clearing with stone amphitheater, prehistoric musical instruments, and young dinosaurs and cavemen sharing jokes and stories around glowing crystals
A remarkable prehistoric ranch with massive nesting areas, incubation caves warmed by hot springs, and gentle cavemen caring for baby pterodactyls learning to fly
A magnificent cascading waterfall creating perpetual rainbow mists, surrounded by flowering meadows where dinosaurs and cavemen live together in joyful harmony
An ancient holy city with stone walls, bustling marketplaces filled with merchants and pilgrims, narrow cobblestone streets, and sacred temples rising toward the heavens
A peaceful town with humble stone buildings, starlit skies, shepherds' fields dotted with sheep, and a sacred stable where miracles began
An ancient walled city with towering palm trees, bustling with traders and travelers, where faith moved mountains and walls came tumbling down
A tranquil bay with wooden fishing boats bobbing on crystal waters, nets drying in the sun, and fishermen sharing stories of miraculous catches
Endless golden dunes stretching to the horizon, scorching sun by day and star-filled skies by night, where wanderers found faith and strength in the wilderness
A humble workshop filled with sawdust and wood shavings, hand tools hanging on the walls, the scent of cedar and olive wood, where skilled hands create with love and purpose
A vibrant school with colorful classrooms, busy hallways filled with lockers and student artwork, playgrounds echoing with laughter, and libraries brimming with knowledge
A cozy backyard transformed into an adventure zone with tents glowing under string lights, campfire crackling, marshmallows roasting, and friends sharing ghost stories under the stars
A bustling city zoo with winding paths through exotic habitats, families watching playful monkeys, majestic lions basking in the sun, and colorful birds singing in tropical aviaries
A bright modern shopping mall with glass skylights, escalators gliding between floors, stores displaying colorful treasures, food courts buzzing with families, and fountains dancing to music
A magical treehouse nestled high in sturdy branches, with rope ladders, wooden platforms, secret compartments for treasures, and windows overlooking the neighborhood below
A lush forest with winding trails through towering trees, sunbeams filtering through leaves, babbling brooks, wildlife peeking from bushes, and breathtaking mountain views at every turn
Create your own unique location with any details you imagine - from underwater cities to cloud kingdoms, let your creativity soar

aiPrompts.description: AI prompts for story and image generation

imageGeneration.thumbnailPrompt: Create a vibrant, child-friendly book cover illustration with the title "{title}" displayed prominently in decorative, readable text integrated into the image design. At the bottom of the image, make text that says 'Created For' with the childrens name appended. Do not include any other text besides the title and childrens name. Style: Illustration in the style of 1950s Golden Books for children: warm, soft watercolor and gouache painting style with rounded, friendly forms and rich saturated colors including golden yellows, deep blues, and coral pinks. Simple, clean composition with gentle lighting and a cozy, nostalgic feel. Characters should have expressive, kind faces with slightly stylized but realistic proportions. Visible brushstrokes and textural quality, avoiding sharp edges or harsh contrasts. Mid-century children's book aesthetic with a timeless, wholesome charm.
imageGeneration.imageRequirements:
Requirements:
- Generate a single high-quality image
- Image should always be in 4:3 ratio
- Style: Professional children's book illustration
- Include vibrant colors and whimsical elements
- The Title should be on the ONLY text in the image
- Make it appealing to young readers (ages 4-10)
